author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sanlam ‍Proposes Placing Of New Ordinary Shares To Raise Up To ZAR 5,700 Mln​
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Sanlam Ltd:
* ‍PROPOSED PLACING OF NEW ORDINARY SHARES TO RAISE UP TO ZAR 5,700 MILLION​
* ‍NET PROCEEDS FROM PLACING WILL BE USED TO PART FUND SAHAM ACQUISITION​
* ‍PLACING IS BEING CONDUCTED THROUGH ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD PROCESS WHICH WILL BE LAUNCHED IMMEDIATELY​
* ‍PRICE PER ORDINARY SHARE AT WHICH PLACING SHARES WILL BE PLACED WILL BE DECIDED AT CLOSE OF BOOKBUILD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
